p: Both environmental and female parameters (Dist, Abund, Aggreg, Mem and Length) substantially modified the mortality and final mass of both the female and her pup. These parameters also influenced several characteristics of the femaleâ€™s foraging behavior: MeanDTrip, MeanTTrip, NbrTrip and NbrFishing. Given the strong linear correlation (r = 0.99) between MeanDTrip and MeanTTrip, only the mean distance travelled was used.
